DOC.brief_summary: Influence of the vitreomacular interface on the progression of diabetic macular edema after treatment with intravitreal injection of vascular endothelial growth factor inhibitors
DOC.brief_title: Influence of the Vitreomacular Interface on the Progression of the Diabetic Macular Edema After Anti-VEGF Injection
DOC.criteria: diabetic macular edema treatable with antiangiogenic drugs age under 18 cardiovascular events during the last year previous vitrectomy previous macular edema treatment during the last 4 months
